statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT id, user_id, bias_score FROM recommendations;
SELECT content_id, user_id, bias_score FROM recommendations WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT id, interaction_type, bias_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY bias_score DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY bias_score DESC;
SELECT content_id, interaction_type FROM recommendations WHERE bias_score > 0.5 AND user_id = 15;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM recommendations WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT content_id, AVG(bias_score) AS average_bias_score FROM recommendations GROUP BY content_id HAVING AVG(bias_score) > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, bias_score FROM recommendations WHERE content_id = 25 ORDER BY bias_score ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content_title, content_category, bias_level FROM biased_content WHERE bias_level > 3 ORDER BY content_category ASC;
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_title, bias_level FROM biased_content WHERE content_category = 'Science' ORDER BY bias_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions JOIN biased_content ON user_interactions.content_id = biased_content.content_id WHERE biased_content.bias_level < 2;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT content_title, content_category, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions UI JOIN biased_content BC ON UI.content_id = BC.content_id GROUP BY content_title, content_category ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT user_id, content_category, AVG(bias_level) AS avg_bias_level FROM user_interactions UI JOIN biased_content BC ON UI.content_id = BC.content_id GROUP BY user_id, content_category HAVING AVG(bias_level) > 3;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT content_name, category, rating FROM content WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT gender, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender='F' AND location='California';
SELECT content_name, rating FROM content WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY content_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, c.content_name, i.timestamp FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN content c ON i.content_id = c.content_id WHERE i.interaction_type='like' ORDER BY i.timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT recommended_content_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_rating FROM content WHERE content_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY content_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, recommended_content_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, location FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT content_id, title, rating FROM content WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, preference_level FROM preferences WHERE preference_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, location FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM content WHERE category='Action' ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND interaction_type='LIKE';
SELECT user_id, content_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations JOIN users ON recommendations.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.age > 25 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;

SELECT users.username, content.title, interactions.interaction_type FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id JOIN content ON interactions.content_id = content.content_id WHERE users.location='New York';
